name: Dashboard Buttons Replacer
description:
Replaces the Tumblr dashboard top icons with cleaner, minimalist designs.

To use your own icons, replace the image url ('http://i46.tinypic.com/2iqdceg.png') to an image of your choice/creation. The image must be 175x36.

Compatible with Missing E.

user.name: Septim
